column5: Task Description
Document detailed requirements and user stories for all user roles
Design UI/UX wireframes and mockups for Super Admin, Company, Vendor, and Candidate portals
Setup cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and dev environments
Finalize database schema for relational and non-relational data
Implement registration and profile creation with resume upload
Build job board for candidates to search and view jobs
Develop simple job application feature
Create dashboard to show application status
Implement company registration and profile setup
Allow manual job posting and publishing to portal
Enable candidate status changes by company
Build auth service for login, roles, and registration
Integrate LLM for AI-based job description generation
Develop resume parser and scoring system using AI
Build chatbot-driven interview scheduling
Allow invited vendors to register and view job requirements
Enable candidate submission by vendors
Track the status of submitted candidates
Create dashboard with total counts for users, jobs, companies
Enable Super Admin to activate/deactivate companies
Build role-specific chatbots for FAQs and status checks
Integrate Stripe or Chargebee for billing
Add voice command support chatbot
Display invoicing and payment analytics
Build end to end -mode chatbot to perform admin tasks
Build end to end -mode chatbot to perform HR tasks
Develop UI for interviewers to rate and give feedback
Show AI feedback and allow human override
Create simulated interview with AI
Automate background checks using public data
Generate letters from templates using LLM
Post jobs to LinkedIn and career pages via API
Create a rich notification system with actions
Monitor system usage and collect user feedback
Use real-world data to refine models
Add dashboards for time-to-hire, cost-per-hire etc.
Integrate with Workday etc.
